name: Community Calendar
description: MAGIC Programs’ community calendar is a compilation of activities, programs, workshops, and opportunities that positively impact the Bayview Hunters Point and Fillmore/Western Addition communities in the areas of employment, internships, affordable housing, events, funding, scholarships, local media, professional development, advocacy, and education. Calendars are updated weekly and sent out on Tuesday for BMAGIC & Thursday for Mo’MAGIC. Includeds: Food pantry days, congregated meals, community
